name: @email-to-ics/extension
description: Chrome extension for email-to-ICS with shared core library

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:shared-core && npm run build:popup && npm run build:content && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/ && cp src/popup.html dist/popup.html && cp src/background.js dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
